author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police have arrested a couple in connection with a series of chain-snatching incidents and recovered five sovereigns and a two-wheeler from them.

Police said that Priyadarshini (26), working in the Regional Transport Office, was riding pillion with her father on a two-wheeler at T.N. Palayam on Monday when two persons riding a motorcycle snatched her chain.

She noted down the registration number of the motorcycle and lodged a complaint with the Thavalakuppam police, which nabbed Anandaraja (25) and his wife Pooja alias Chaturya (20) of Thirumagal Nagar in Velrampet and recovered the chain.

Investigations revealed that the couple were involved in chain-snatching incidents in Lawspet and Mangalam. The couple was arrested and remanded to custody.

title: Couple held for chain snatching
